attributes.action: Ban immigrants from claiming benefits for  the first two years when arriving in th UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Put a cap on immigrant's from claiming benefit's for the first two years of arriving in the UK, so they will have to gain employment when entering the UK as a result it will ease the strain on the overstretched benefits system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
